content.json: Query Will Not Return Results Until You Enter a Server Hostname

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let SystemPerformance = 
    uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
    | where Computer == MachineName
    | summarize 
        AvgCPURelativeFrequencyPercent = avg(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent_d)
        by Computer;
let MachineInventory = 
    uberAgent_System_MachineInventory_CL 
    | where Computer == MachineName
    | sort by TimeGenerated desc
    | take 1
    | project
        Computer, 
        LatestCPUCoresLogical = CPUCoresLogical_d,
        HwManufacturer = HwManufacturer_s,
        HwModel = HwModel_s,
        LatestCPUMaxMhz = CPUMaxMhz_d,
        LatestRAMSizeGB = RAMSizeGB_d;
MachineInventory
| join kind=inner (SystemPerformance) on Computer
| extend 
    CPUBaseGHz = round(LatestCPUMaxMhz / 1000.0, 2),
    CPUActualGHz = round(LatestCPUMaxMhz / 1000.0 * AvgCPURelativeFrequencyPercent / 100.0, 2)
| project 
    Computer,
    HwManufacturer,
    HwModel,
    CPUActualGHz,
    CPUBaseGHz,
    LatestCPUCoresLogical,
    LatestRAMSizeGB

let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let systemPerformance = 
    uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
    | where Computer == MachineName
    | summarize 
        AvgCPUUsagePercent = avg(CPUUsagePercent_d),
        AvgIOPercentDiskTime = avg(IOPercentDiskTime_d),
        AvgRAMUsagePercent = avg(RAMUsagePercent_d),
        AvgNetUtilizationPercent = avg(NetUtilizationPercent_d),
        AvgPagefileUsagePercent = avg(PagefileUsagePercent_d)
        by Computer
    | extend 
        AvgCPUUsagePercentRounded = round(AvgCPUUsagePercent, 1),
        AvgIOPercentDiskTimeRounded = round(AvgIOPercentDiskTime, 2),
        AvgRAMUsagePercentRounded = round(AvgRAMUsagePercent, 1),
        AvgNetUtilizationPercentRounded = round(AvgNetUtilizationPercent, 1),
        AvgPagefileUsagePercentRounded = round(AvgPagefileUsagePercent, 1)
    | project Computer, AvgCPUUsagePercentRounded, AvgIOPercentDiskTimeRounded, AvgRAMUsagePercentRounded, AvgNetUtilizationPercentRounded, AvgPagefileUsagePercentRounded;
let uiDelay = 
    uberAgent_Application_UIDelay_CL
    | where Computer == MachineName
    | summarize SumUIDelayMs = sum(UIDelayMs_d) by Computer
    | extend SumUIDelayS = round(SumUIDelayMs / 1000, 1)
    | project Computer, SumUIDelayS;
let logonDetails = uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
| where Computer == MachineName
| summarize 
    LogonCount = dcount(SessionGUID_g),
    AvgTotalLogonTimeMs = avg(TotalLogonTimeMs_d)
    by Computer
| extend AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded = iff(isnull(AvgTotalLogonTimeMs), "n/a", tostring(round(AvgTotalLogonTimeMs / 1000.0, 2)))
| project Computer, AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded;
systemPerformance
| join kind=inner (uiDelay) on Computer
| join kind=inner (logonDetails) on Computer
| project Computer, AvgCPUUsagePercentRounded, AvgRAMUsagePercentRounded, AvgIOPercentDiskTimeRounded, AvgNetUtilizationPercentRounded, SumUIDelayS, AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded, AvgPagefileUsagePercentRounded;

let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let Process_NetworkTargetPerformance = 
    uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL 
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        SumNetTargetSendMB = sum(NetTargetSendMB_d),
        SumNetTargetReceiveMB = sum(NetTargetReceiveMB_d)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h);

Process_NetworkTargetPerformance
| project 
    TimeGenerated, 
    SumNetTargetSendMB, 
    SumNetTargetReceiveMB
| render columnchart
content.title: Network data volume over time

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let System_SystemPerformanceSummary = 
    uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        EventCount = count(),
        SumRAMUsageGB = sum(RAMUsageGB_d)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h);

System_SystemPerformanceSummary
| extend 
    AvgRAMGB = round(SumRAMUsageGB / EventCount, 1)
| project 
    TimeGenerated, 
    AvgRAMGB
| render columnchart
content.title: RAM over time

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";

uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL 
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        AvgNetTargetSendLatencyMs_d = avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| extend 
    AvgSendLatencyMs = round(AvgNetTargetSendLatencyMs_d, 1)
| project 
    TimeGenerated,
    AvgSendLatencyMs
content.title: Network latency over time

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let System_SystemPerformanceSummary = 
    uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        EventCount = count(),
        SumRAMUsageGB = sum(RAMUsageGB_d),
        SumCPUUsagePercent = sum(CPUUsagePercent_d)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h);

System_SystemPerformanceSummary
| extend 
    AvgCPUPercent = round(SumCPUUsagePercent / EventCount, 1)
| project 
    TimeGenerated, 
    AvgCPUPercent
| render timechart
content.title: CPU over time

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";

uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where Computer in (MachineName)
| summarize
    ["#Users"] = dcount(ProcUser_s),
    ["Process name(s)"] = makeset(ProcName_s),
    AvgProcCPUPercent = avg(ProcCPUPercent_d),
    AvgProcIOPS = avg(ProcIOPSRead_d + ProcIOPSWrite_d),
    SumProcIOCount = sum(ProcIOReadCount_d + ProcIOWriteCount_d) ,
    SumProcIODurationMs = sum(ProcIOLatencyReadMs2_d * ProcIOReadCount_d + ProcIOLatencyWriteMs2_d * ProcIOWriteCount_d),
    AvgProcWorkingSetMB = avg(ProcWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgProcNetKBPS = avg(ProcNetKBPS_d)
    by AppId_s
| join kind=leftouter 
    (uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        SumNetTargetSendLatencyCount = sum(NetTargetSendLatencyCount_d),
        SumNetTargetSendDurationMs = sum(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d * NetTargetSendLatencyCount_d)
        by AppId_s)
    on AppId_s
| join kind=leftouter 
    (uberAgent_Application_UIDelay_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize
        SumUIDelayMs = sum(UIDelayMs_d)
        by AppId_s)
    on AppId_s

| join kind=leftouter 
    (uberAgent_Application_AppNameIdMapping_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
     | summarize
        AppName = any(AppName_s)
        by AppId_s)
    on AppId_s
| extend ["Avg. CPU (%)"] = round(AvgProcCPUPercent, 1)
| extend ["Avg. IOPS"] = round(AvgProcIOPS, 1)
| extend ["Avg. IO latency (ms)"] = round(SumProcIODurationMs / SumProcIOCount, 1)
| extend ["Avg. RAM (MB)"] = round(AvgProcWorkingSetMB, 0)
| extend ["Avg. net thruput (KB/s)"] = round(AvgProcNetKBPS, 1)
| extend ["Avg. net latency (ms)"] = round(SumNetTargetSendDurationMs / SumNetTargetSendLatencyCount, 1)
| extend ["UI unresponsiveness (s)"] = round(SumUIDelayMs / 1000, 1)
| project
    AppName,
    ["Process name(s)"],
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"],
    ["Avg. IOPS"],
    ["Avg. IO latency (ms)"],
    ["Avg. RAM (MB)"],
    ["Avg. net thruput (KB/s)"],
    ["Avg. net latency (ms)"],
    ["UI unresponsiveness (s)"],
    ["#Users"]
| sort by AppName asc
content.title: Applications

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let NetworkTargetPerformance = 
    uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
    | where Computer == MachineName
    | summarize 
        TargetIP = any(NetTargetRemoteAddress_s), 
        SumNetTargetSendCount = sum(NetTargetSendCount_d),
        SumNetTargetReceiveCount = sum(NetTargetReceiveCount_d),
        SumNetTargetConnectCount = sum(NetTargetConnectCount_d),
        SumNetTargetReconnectCount = sum(NetTargetReconnectCount_d),
        SumNetTargetRetransmitCount = sum(NetTargetRetransmitCount_d),
        SumNetTargetSendMB = sum(NetTargetSendMB_d),
        SumNetTargetReceiveMB = sum(NetTargetReceiveMB_d),
        SumNetTargetSendLatencyCount = sum(NetTargetSendLatencyCount_d),
        SumNetTargetSendDurationMs = sum(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d),
        ProcessCount = dcount(ProcName_s),
        UserCount = dcount(ProcUser_s)
    by NetTargetRemotePort_d, NetTargetProtocols_s;

NetworkTargetPerformance
| extend 
    SendCount = round(SumNetTargetSendCount, 0),
    ReceiveCount = round(SumNetTargetReceiveCount, 0),
    ConnectCount = round(SumNetTargetConnectCount, 0),
    ReconnectCount = round(SumNetTargetReconnectCount, 0),
    RetransmitCount = round(SumNetTargetRetransmitCount, 0),
    SendVolumeMB = round(SumNetTargetSendMB, 1),
    ReceiveVolumeMB = round(SumNetTargetReceiveMB, 1),
    AvgSendLatencyMS = iif(SumNetTargetSendLatencyCount > 0, round(SumNetTargetSendDurationMs * 1.0 / SumNetTargetSendLatencyCount, 1), 0.0),
    SortField = tolower(NetTargetRemotePort_d)
| project 
    Target = NetTargetRemotePort_d,
    TargetIP,
    Protocols = NetTargetProtocols_s,
    SendCount,
    ReceiveCount,
    ConnectCount,
    ReconnectCount,
    RetransmitCount,
    SendVolumeMB,
    ReceiveVolumeMB,
    AvgSendLatencyMS,
    ProcessCount,
    UserCount,
    SortField
| sort by SortField asc
| project-away SortField
content.title: Network Connections

content.query:
let MachineName = "{MachineName}";
let VolumeInventory = 
uberAgent_System_VolumeInventory_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName) and isnotempty(MountPoints_s)
    | summarize 
        IsBootVolume = any(IsBootVolume_b),
        IsDirty = any(IsDirty_b),
        FileSystem = any(FileSystem_s),
        LatestUsedSpacePercent = max(UsedSpacePercent_d),
        LatestFreeMB = max(FreeMB_d),
        CapacityMB = any(CapacityMB_d),
        PartitionStyle = any(PartitionStyle_s)
    by Computer, MountPoints_s, DiskNumbers_s;

let VolumeCalculations = 
    VolumeInventory
    | extend 
        FreeSpaceGB = round(LatestFreeMB / 1024, 1),
        FreeSpacePercent = round(100 - LatestUsedSpacePercent, 1),
        UsedSpaceGB = round(CapacityMB * LatestUsedSpacePercent / 100 / 1024, 1)
    | project 
        Computer,
        Path = MountPoints_s,
        FreeSpaceGB,
        UsedSpaceGB,
        FreeSpacePercent,
        FileSystem,
        PartitionStyle,
        IsBootVolume,
        IsDirty,
        DiskNumber = toint(DiskNumbers_s);


let DiskInventory = 
    uberAgent_System_DiskInventory_CL
    | where Computer in (MachineName)
    | summarize 
        DeviceName = any(Name_s),
        IsRemovable = any(IsRemovable_b),
        IsWritable = any(IsWritable_b)
    by Computer, DiskNumber_d
    | extend DiskNumber = toint(DiskNumber_d)
    | project 
        Computer, 
        DiskNumber, 
        DeviceName, 
        IsRemovable, 
        IsWritable;


VolumeCalculations
| join kind=leftouter  (
    DiskInventory
    | project 
        Computer,
        DiskNumber,
        DeviceName,
        IsRemovable,
        IsWritable
) on Computer, DiskNumber
| project 
    Host= Computer,
    Path,
    FreeSpaceGB,
    UsedSpaceGB,
    FreeSpacePercent,
    DeviceName,
    FileSystem,
    PartitionStyle,
    IsBootVolume,
    Chkdsk_req = IsDirty,
    IsRemovable,
    IsWritable
| order by Host, Path
content.title: Disk Space
